author: .vbuterin
content: Though flattening the tree to 1 layer (this includes both storage *and* merkleized code; the two should ideally be treated identically) would make it easier

author: pipermerriam
content: Agreed that merging the tries (account, storage, merklized code) is the ideal state for us to be in, but if our witness spec is capable of transparently doing  this for us we do get some latitude with being able to start treating them the same before they actually are the same. I'm still onboard with merging them but the timeline for that almost definitely further down the road than the timeline for when we start using witnesses for state sync and block witnesses

author: Deleted User
content: Yes, for the purpose of witnesses, tries are unified.
